Title: Memento Mori
Plot: Striken with amnesia and on the run, Vala takes a job as a waitress as she tries to piece together who she is and what happened to her.
GuestStars: Gary Jones, Patricia Harras, Peter Benson, Sean Owen Roberts, Brian Davies, Heather Christie, Adrian Holmes, Don Stark, Sonya Salomaa, Brendan Beiser, Phillip Mitchell
